name: Foundations of Ninja-ing
description: An introduction to the history and essentials of ninja-ing.

lessons.name: History of Ninja-ing
lessons.description: A brief history of ninja-ing and its cultural significance.

lessons.name: Stances and Movements
lessons.description: Introduction to basic stances and movements in ninja-ing.

lessons.name: Stealth and Discipline
lessons.description: Overview of stealth techniques and the discipline of ninja-ing.

name: Physical Techniques and Acrobatics
description: This module focuses on developing agility, strength, and coordination through rigorous physical training.

lessons.name: Silent Movement
lessons.description: Techniques for moving silently and avoiding detection.

lessons.name: Basic Acrobatics
lessons.description: Overview of basic acrobatic techniques and movements.

lessons.name: Advanced Acrobatics
lessons.description: Understanding advanced acrobatic techniques including flips and aerial maneuvers.

name: Tools, Weapons, and Strategy
description: Principles of tools, weapons, and strategic planning in ninja-ing.

lessons.name: Safety
lessons.description: Understanding safety protocols when handling ninja tools and weapons.

lessons.name: Throwing Stars
lessons.description: Techniques for effectively using throwing stars in various scenarios.

lessons.name: Staff and Sword Techniques
lessons.description: Overview of staff and sword techniques in ninja-ing.

name: React Fundamentals
description: Introduction to React concepts, JSX, and component-based architecture.

name: State Management and Hooks
description: Exploring state, props, and the use of React hooks for dynamic applications.

name: Building and Deploying Applications
description: Hands-on module for building, testing, and deploying React applications.

name: Debate Fundamentals
description: Core principles of argumentation, logic, and public speaking.

name: Bowl Debate Strategies
description: Techniques and strategies unique to bowl debate competitions.

name: Endurance and Ethics
description: Managing long debates, ethical considerations, and maintaining composure.

name: Introduction to Coral Reefs
description: Overview of coral reef ecosystems and their importance.

name: Excavation Techniques
description: Safe and effective methods for coral reef excavation.

name: Industry and Career Skills
description: Professional skills and career pathways in coral reef excavation.

name: Whisking Basics
description: Fundamental whisking techniques and kitchen safety.

name: Advanced Whisking Methods
description: Mastering specialized whisking styles and recipes.

name: Culinary Discipline
description: Kitchen etiquette, discipline, and working under pressure.

name: Nerd History and Culture
description: Exploring the history, culture, and impact of nerds in society.

name: Advanced Geekery
description: Deep dives into topics beloved by nerds: math, science, and pop culture.

name: Dweeb Studies
description: An exploration of the social dynamics and cultural significance of 'dweeb' identity.

name: Introduction to Hyperbolic Spaces
description: Understanding the mathematics and philosophy of hyperbolic geometry.

name: Knitting in Higher Dimensions
description: Techniques for knitting objects that defy traditional geometry.

name: Existential Knitting
description: Philosophical implications and personal experiences of hyperbolic knitting.
